short_description: ABK SiteHoster is aLEHNS (a Lightweight Extensible HTTP Network Server). Developed in pure Java. Currently supports HTTP v1.1 Protocol's subset. Adding features to make fully compliant. Aiming to be a full-fledged WebSite Server with all Web Service
